question: Roger Moore, the James Bond actor passed away. He hailed from which country?
explanation: Sir Roger George Moore (89), the well-known British actor, has recently passed away in Switzerland after a brief battle with cancer. He was best known for his role as James Bond in films such as \"Live and Let Die\" and \"The Spy Who Loved Me\". Moore was the only actor who portrayed the popular fictional spy in seven movies between 1973 and 1985.
